ca.uqac.lif.textidote.as

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.as.Position
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Position>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Position.Nowhere

    public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Position>
    Represents a position in a text file. This position is expressed in *characters*, not in *bytes*.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Position.Nowhere
      Position that refers to no specific location in a file
